sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the use of a digital timer for timing laboratory processes.
sections.scope: Applicable to procedural monitoring in Pharmaceutical Chemistry.
procedure: Power ON the timer and clear any previous settings by pressing the 'CLEAR' or 'RESET' button.
Enter the required time duration using the Hour, Minute, and Second buttons.
Press the 'START' button to begin the countdown.
When the alarm sounds at the end of the duration, press 'STOP' to silence it.
For count-up mode, press 'START' when the display is at zero.
Pause the timer if necessary using the 'STOP/PAUSE' button and resume with 'START'.
Clear the display and switch OFF the timer after completing the task.
precautions: Ensure the alarm volume is set loud enough to be heard in the lab environment.
Do not expose the timer to liquids or chemical spills.
Replace batteries promptly to avoid the timer stopping unexpectedly.
Do not drop the timer or subject it to heavy impact.
